name: 3rd International Conference on Smart Data Intelligence
content: In this technological era, numerous digital things are generated with which the amount of data being collected is increasing at an unprecedented rate. Accordingly, many emerging related fields like big data, data science, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning have deployed a paradigm shift in various data-driven approaches that tends to evolve new data-driven research opportunities in various influential domains like social networks, healthcare, information & communication applications and so forth.
organizers: Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology
